land2page.text: The global South is rapidly catching up with the developed world. It's time for you to get to know the rapid development, innovation and drive going on in this part of the world (East-Africa, South Asia and beyond).

page4.title: Elewa NV, a multi-stakeholder cooperation
page4.text1: At the heart of Elewa lies the structure Elewa NV. Based in Brussels, Belgium, Elewa NV is a private holding company which controls the assets of all Elewa activities.
page4.text2: Elewa NV is owned and controlled by Elewa's founder, a small community of investors which share in the vision of Elewa and Elewa employees based throughout the activities of the group.

page5.title: The Elewa Creative Hub
page5.text1: Coming soon; The Elewa Creative Hub Lies at the heart of our organization. A two-acre property at the center of Nairobi's creative district, the hub connects all Elewa's Activities under a single banner.
page5.text2: Through partnerships with creative community, the Elewa Hub will organize vibrant activites that bring talents from different fields (tech, business, art, fashion) together to nurture continuous innovation.

page6.title: Investing in Elewa NV
page6.text1: From time to time, we offer investment opportunities (private equity & debt) to out community of investors. Interested to take part when this opportunity arrives?

social-l.header: Human and Environmental Impact through Social Enterprise

social-l2.title: (Social) business for the win
social-l2.description: With a young dynamic population that is eager to contribute to the global economy, East Africa has a lot to offer to the world. Now is the time to nurture sustainable, inclusive and scalable business. The rest will take care of itself.

social-l3.title: A cooperative mindset
social-l3.text1: Elewa has one shared objective; To unlock the true potential of individuals, teams, and the community. We believe strongly in the power of sharing ideas and continuously strive to grow each other and ourselves. Internally, but also within the larger communities in which we are active.

social-l4.title: Beyond business
social-l4.text1: We channel a good amount of our resources into giving back.
social-l4.text2: Through projects such as our coding school in Kakuma refugee camp, training teachers in pastoral Samburu and our open-source coding initiatives providing entry-level opportunities to hundreds of junior engineers
social-l4.text3: These projects don't necessarily have an immediate financial return, but their impact can be tangibly measured in the long-term.

social-l5.title: Open knowledge
social-l5.text1: What we learn, we share. Through community events, open knowledge repositories, regular teaching moments (everyone a teacher) and academic partnerships.
social-l5.text2: We build for today, with a lens on tomorrow.
